name: Baby Supermarket Manager - Time Management Game
name_original: Baby Supermarket Manager - Time Management Game
description:
Hey kids! Welcome to our newest time management game for kids, no matter if you are 5 or 6 years old you will love to play Baby Supermarket manager, since we have made it really easy for all kids to have fun in grocery store, in which a supermarket manager knows how to manage a grocery store all alone. So kids its your chance to become a supermarket manager & learn to manage grocery store, not only your management skills will be polished but also you will learn how to operate cash register & handle money. Baby Supermarket manager is a fast paced time management game to test your time management skills all in a speedy way. Baby Supermarket manager is an educational cashier game for young boys & girls. In Baby Supermarket manager kids can learn how to handle money as grocery store cashier mania to become the best toddler store manager in town. Kids can improve their basic math learning skills like addition & subtraction. Baby store is full of awesome shopping items like baby food, toys, section full of beautiful toddlers dresses. A supermarket manager knows how to operate the grocery cash register, serving the customers on time, so they don’t get mad on any kind of delays to get their toys, baby food & kids dresses.

Baby Supermarket manager starts with a manual cash register with receipt and scanner, you have to enter the price of each grocery item and get the total. Tap on the customer to receive money. Cashier drawer will open and you can put the received money and return the balance amount to the customer. You can upgrade your manual cash register, with the automated one so you can scan each grocery list the customer brings to the counter, and ring up the price! Then accept payment via cash, credit card or through mobile NFC, and enter the total amount, followed by scanning the credit card or mobile! In this time management fun filled cash register game you can also improve your store management skills. Customers are in queue, waiting to pay money and get their grocery like toys for toddlers, food for baby & kids dresses. Baby Supermarket manager is an educational and fun game where children learn to handle money at shopping mall. It can help improve their math and calculation skills.

Features:
* Fast paced Time Management Cash Register Simulation.
* Serve customers & make them happy to get rewards.
* Modern payment methods; Credit Card Machine and NFC Mobile payments.
* Unlock Point Of Sale Machine to scan grocery.
* A fun filled supermarket cash register games.
* Use Auto Complete Robot to get task done automatically.
* Use Cool Candies to increase patience of customers.
* Multiple Machines and Purchasing Items.
* Cater your Clients with multifunctional machines.
